text: Heisteria is a genus of plant in family Olacaceae. It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Heisteria acuminata * Heisteria asplundii, Sleumer * Heisteria concinna, Standl. * Heisteria costaricensis, Donn. Sm. * Heisteria cyathiformis, Little * Heisteria fatoensis, Standl. * Heisteria longipes, Standl. * Heisteria maguirei, Sleumer * Heisteria pallida, Engl. * Heisteria parvifolia, Sm. == References == == External links == Category:Olacaceae Category:Santalales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Heisteria
